description.zh: 康奈尔大学运营的开放获取预印本服务器，是 AI/ML 研究的首发平台，每天数百篇新论文
description.en: Open-access preprint server operated by Cornell University, the primary venue for AI/ML research with hundreds of new papers daily

authority_justification.zh: 康奈尔大学运营，获得西蒙斯基金会等资助，是全球物理学和计算机科学的标准预印本平台
authority_justification.en: Operated by Cornell University, funded by Simons Foundation, the standard preprint platform for physics and CS globally
